original_title: Percy McPhee - Agent des Grauens (6. + 7. Folge)
overview: The drawings on which the series is based were created in 1969 and served as a template for a slide series in 1970. During her screening, this is interrupted by the film "Percy McPhee Agent of Horror (6th + 7th episode)".
title: Percy McPhee - Agent des Grauens (6. + 7. Folge)
